content: रु {vI.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (रौति, रवीति, रुत) To cry, howl, scream, yell, shout, roar; to hum (as bees); to sound in general; कर्णे कलं किमपि रौति शनैर्विचित्रं <ls>H. 1. 81</ls>; <ls>Bk. 3. 17</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">12. 72</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">14. 21.</ls> {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (रवते) {@--1@} To go, move. {@--2@} To hurt, kill. {@--3@} <ab>Ved.</ab> To break to pieces.
रुः {@--1@} Sound, noise. {@--2@} Fear, alarm. {@--3@} War, battle. {@--4@} Cutting, dividing.
